title: Integrations
description: Connect to external tools and services

linear.title: Linear
linear.syncDescription: Create and update Linear issues automatically
linear.importExistingDescription: Select which Linear issues to import into AutoBuild as tasks.
linear.realtimeSyncDescription: Automatically import new tasks created in Linear
linear.realtimeWarning: When enabled, new Linear issues will be automatically imported into AutoBuild. Make sure to configure your team/project filters below to control which issues are imported.

github.title: GitHub
github.syncDescription: Sync issues from GitHub and create tasks automatically
github.tokenDescription: Create a token with 'repo' scope at
github.importExistingDescription: Select which GitHub issues to import into AutoBuild as tasks.
github.tokenScope: Create a token with {{scope}} scope from
github.issuesAvailableDescription: Access GitHub Issues from the sidebar to view, investigate, and create tasks from issues.
github.autoSyncDescription: Automatically fetch issues when the project loads
github.defaultBranchDescription: Base branch for creating task worktrees
github.branchSelectHint: All new tasks will branch from {{branch}}
github.repoConfiguredFor: This GitHub repository is configured only for {{name}}.
github.individualRepoHint: Each project can have its own GitHub repository.

gitlab.title: GitLab
gitlab.syncDescription: Sync issues from GitLab and create tasks automatically
gitlab.tokenDescription: Create a token with 'api' scope at
gitlab.importExistingDescription: Select which GitLab issues to import into AutoBuild as tasks.
gitlab.projectIdDescription: GitLab Project ID or URL-encoded path

memory.title: Memory
memory.syncDescription: Persistent cross-session memory and semantic search
memory.enableMemoryDescription: Persistent cross-session memory using LadybugDB (embedded database)
memory.fileBasedFallback: Using file-based memory. Session insights are stored locally in JSON files. Enable Memory for persistent cross-session context with semantic search.
memory.agentMemoryAccessDescription: Allow agents to search and add to the knowledge graph via MCP
memory.graphitiMcpUrlDescription: URL of the Graphiti MCP server for agent memory access
memory.embeddingProviderDescription: Provider for semantic search (optional - keyword search works without)

openAI.globalDescription: Using key from App Settings. Enter a project-specific key below to override.

apiKeysInfo: Keys set here are used as defaults. Individual projects can override these in their settings.
